message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I've got to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $180.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $160?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $170. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $165?
I've already given you a pretty good deal, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $175. That's the lowest price I can accept for the product.
